title: Kanye West, Laquan McDonald, Big Game Tickets, Method Man and more.
itunes:title: Kanye West, Laquan McDonald, Big Game Tickets, Method Man and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Do you want to be right or happy? The Jackpot Joint of Jer$alem is doing some damage control because 3500 pieces got displaced all over. The CLO got a very clear message for the ladies. Not all things done on the job are appropriate. Someone is Chicago is out for good behavior and the people are outraged. Junior has a Black History Message for Karen. Ticket prices for LA VS Cincinnati are sky high. Would You Rather had some interesting scenarios. The Ticallion Stallion got the ladies heads turning! Kanye is being ridiculous and does not see what is coming at him. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve reminds us that our lives are not by accident and that they are by design.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
